java.lang.Object
EmployeeDAOTest
public class EmployeeDAOTest extends Object
Author: Alejandro Zubillaga Course: 202430-CEN-3024C-31950 Date: Jun 1, 2024 Software Development I Main Class Test class for the EmployeeDAO class, providing unit tests for the creation and retrieval of employees.

  • Method Details

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()

    • testCreateEmployee

      public void testCreateEmployee()

    • testGetEmployeeByID

      public void testGetEmployeeByID()
      Tests the creation of an employee and retrieval of the same employee by ID. Verifies that all employee details are correctly stored and retrieved.

    • testUpdateEmployee

      public void testUpdateEmployee()
      Tests the retrieval of an employee by ID. Verifies that the correct employee is retrieved and all details match.

    • testDeleteEmployeeByID

      public void testDeleteEmployeeByID()
      Tests the deletion of an employee by ID. Verifies that the employee is successfully deleted and cannot be retrieved by ID.

    • testDeleteEmployeeByEmail

      public void testDeleteEmployeeByEmail()
      Tests the deletion of an employee by email. Verifies that the correct employee is deleted and the other employees remain unaffected.

    • testGetEmployeesByFilter

      public void testGetEmployeesByFilter()
      Tests the retrieval of employees by filter criteria (department, job title, salary range). Verifies that the correct employees are returned based on the filter criteria.

    • testGetAllEmployees

      public void testGetAllEmployees()
      Tests the retrieval of all employees. Verifies that all employees are returned and their details are correct.
